synopsis.text:
Legend speaks of a mythical pickle, capable of granting the deepest desire of the one who consumes it. Guarded by the formidable Megalo Dragon atop a towering mountain, the journey to obtain this 'Pickle of Happiness' is no easy feat. Enter Nike, a valiant hero, and Kukuri, a skilled mage, who embark on this daring quest, joined by an eccentric group of companions.

From a loincloth-clad wind spirit to a dance-loving, half-dressed elder, their journey is filled with bizarre encounters and fierce rivals. Among them is Juju, a shrine maiden driven by a prophecy, who also seeks the magical pickle. Together, they must overcome numerous obstacles, battle various monsters, and ultimately face the legendary Megalo Dragon. Will Nike and Kukuri's courage and determination be enough to claim the wish-granting pickle? Join them in this thrilling adventure to find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
